00012 class Xml;
00013 
00014 //---------------------------------------------------------
00015 //   Signature Event
00016 //    for regular measures: ticks = ticks_measure(z, n)
00017 //    for irregular measures z/n has no meaning
00018 //---------------------------------------------------------
00019 
00020 struct SigEvent {
00021       bool irregular;
00022       int ticks;
00023       int z, n;            // measure signature
00024       int bar;             // precomputed
00025 
00026       int read(QDomNode);
00027       void write(Xml&, int) const;
00028 
00029       SigEvent() { }
00030       SigEvent(int Z, int N);
00031       SigEvent(int, int, int);
00032       };
00033 
00034 //---------------------------------------------------------
00035 //   SigList
00036 //---------------------------------------------------------
00037 
00038 typedef std::map<const int, SigEvent>::iterator iSigEvent;
00039 typedef std::map<const int, SigEvent>::const_iterator ciSigEvent;
00040 
00041 class SigList : public std::map<const int, SigEvent > {
00042       void normalize();
00043 
00044    public:
00045       SigList() {}
00046       void add(int tick, int z, int n);
00047       void add(int tick, int ticks, int z, int n);
00048       void del(int tick);
00049 
00050       void read(QDomNode);
00051       void write(Xml&) const;
00052 
00053       void timesig(int tick, int& z, int& n) const;
00054       void tickValues(int t, int* bar, int* beat, int* tick) const;
00055       int bar2tick(int bar, int beat, int tick) const;
00056 
00057       int ticksMeasure(int tick) const;
00058 
00059       void removeTime(int start, int len);
00060       void insertTime(int start, int len);
00061       };
00062 
00063 extern int ticks_measure(int Z, int N);
